channel.title: Telluride on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Telluride on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere’ Review: Jeremy Allen White Gives Raw, Internalized Performance as The Boss in Contemplative Bio-Drama
item.description: Jeremy Strong, Stephen Graham and Odessa Young also star in Scott Cooper’s examination of the brutal comedown after a blockbuster tour, which yielded the musician’s most personal album.

item.title: ‘Springsteen: Deliver Me From Nowhere’ Review: Jeremy Allen White Gives Raw, Internalized Performance as The Boss in Contemplative Bio-Drama
item.description: Jeremy Strong, Stephen Graham and Odessa Young also star in Scott Cooper’s examination of the brutal comedown after a blockbuster tour, which yielded the musician’s most personal album.

item.title: ‘Highway 99: A Double Album’ Review: Ethan Hawke Pays Tribute to Merle Haggard With a Rousing and Soulful Pilgrimage Through His Songs
item.description: The director gathers a who’s who of musicians for performances and conversation about the country luminary.

item.title: ‘Highway 99: A Double Album’ Review: Ethan Hawke Pays Tribute to Merle Haggard With a Rousing and Soulful Pilgrimage Through His Songs
item.description: The director gathers a who’s who of musicians for performances and conversation about the country luminary.

item.title: Paul McCartney Documentary ‘Man on the Run’ Picked Up by Amazon MGM Ahead of Telluride Debut (Exclusive)
item.description: Morgan Neville, who previously directed ‘20 Feet from Stardom’ and last year’s ‘Piece by Piece,’ chronicles McCartney’s post-Beatles 1970s era.

item.title: Paul McCartney Documentary ‘Man on the Run’ Picked Up by Amazon MGM Ahead of Telluride Debut (Exclusive)
